评论概述: Cozy and comfortable fabulous for fall.
评论详情: Super comfortable, buttery soft. A heavier weight , but not where you get hot. Order your correct size, measure your true waist. It’s tapered with the front shorter than the back. Elevated casual look, great fit and feel. It’s a beautiful dark navy, and the pants have a nice wide leg. definitely recommend it. Can’t Wait until it gets cooler for the fall I’m gonna rock this outfit To my festive fall events.

The fabric is so soft and comfy to wear.  It looks very high end.  The only reason that I gave it 4 stars, is that the pants seem off size.  They are bigger and longer fitting.  It works for around the house so you may want to size accordingly. The color is fabulous.

I really wanted to love this. Over the last five years, my fashion style has become very casual ... and while I am NOT going back, I like to look polished and pulled together. This design is a wonderful concept ... but the reality is something completely different. The sizing runs true, IMO. I have no complaint about the fit. However, the material has a very inexpensive shiny sheen to it and feels ... too slinky in my hand. It is all synthetic ... and I am afraid it would never be the *just right* temperature to wear it. Even in the dead of winter, interiors are well heated ... I overheated simply trying it on with the air conditioner going strong. You would think with the high synthetic content of the fabric, it would release wrinkles like a dream. BUT it does not. I have washed it according to the manufacturer's directions, I have washed it following the complete opposite of the manufacturer's directions ... I have tumbled dried on permanent press. I have line dried. Both pieces still hold traces of the packaging folds! I am loathe to iron or steam casual wear. That is my line in the sand!
Quality is top notch.  Very sleek.  Incredibly soft and stylish

This is so cute!!  The quality is amazing.  I’m about to order all colors.

The set is well made, the material is soft, and it is roomy and comfortable to wear.  However, for my wife's body the pants are a little too big with the crotch hanging too low.  It would fit better for someone who has a fuller figure (but not plus size).
Love the Oversize look. Pants are long, sleeves fit well. The material is soft, not see through. My go to for chilly weather this autumn. Not sure how warm it is.

I am 5'4 and 135lbs for reference and this is a small. I would order true to size but i will say that these pants feel ENORMOUS on me. They are high waisted and come with a tie/cinched waist adjuster for your preference, but the pants are just really wide and really long even though they come up to my ribcage.  The top is very much the same, it is small but feels a bit "oversized" in nature. It has a collared neckline which is nice for going out of the house in it, it gives more of a "im not in sweat clothes" type of feel. It has pockets on both sides but no back ones. The material is nice and thick and will not shrink or fade much when washed or dried.  The color is good but a bit of a faded black and nothing seems to stick to this material, as in liquid beads right off which is fantastic!! For me its just ok, remember order true to size if not a size smaller for a nicer fit.

I love this outfit! I've seen other people wearing similar outfits - same color pants/top, almost loungewear - so I wanted to try that look out myself. This outfit is incredibly comfortable. The fabric is so soft and it feels like pajamas! While I wouldn't wear this outfit to my office job, it's perfect for any day around the house or running errands around town. Definitely recommend, as this will become a regular outfit in my rotation.
Cute outfit and very soft . I am 5'9" and the Pants are actually a decent length .

I ordered my normal size, medium, and tried on the top first. Fit great.  Put the pants on next and couldn’t believe how huge they are. They are extremely high-waisted and the butt and legs have at least 8 inches of extra fabric.  I wouldn’t wear this out to check the mailbox. Returning.
Super soft, great fit. Perfect travel wear!

评论概述: I want to live in these
评论详情: These are such a nice soft material and I love how they feel. They're super comfy and I like wearing them around my house for the day. They're a pretty color as well and came true to size
This outfit is super comfortable and fits perfectly!  I think this will be my go-to lounge wear for the winter!

I am really looking at this outfit and such amazement for how wonderful the material is and the durability of its overall, it has a beautiful deep rich blue color I would say more on the deeper side of Navy, and the fit is pretty supreme, very nice! Now originally I knew I could fit the bottoms better and not the top because I'm heavy but I know my mother could fit the top so we're trading off but I did try it on fully and it fits very well, it's perfect for fall and some chilly ❄ seasons and I love the pockets as well as the whole fit of the outfit itself because you can tell that the material was taken care of in the process, very hard to find the office like this and this will keep you good for at least three seasons out the year, very nice and stylish, we are loving it 😂, thank you!

This is without a doubt, a quality constructed, well made, soft, trendy, vibrant/cold rich garment- & the pants? A total dream! I do feel for more versatility though, the top could’ve been a wee bit more whimsical in its engineering (shape)- because that would’ve given the wearer more style options & interchangeability for styling & fashion. Nonetheless, this is an incredible duo; the pants & shirt alike are buttery, velvety soft making for a cozy effortless look & feel you can dress up or keep as is. The pants do pay mind, are for me a perfect length (I’m 5’5)- my only stance here & not to be persnickety but I almost feel as though there are perhaps several elastic bands within the waist of the pants. And on the thick side- it’s a bit heavy while wearing but not uncomfortable ( I just felt it worthy to note in case that will make a difference in your mind on what size you wish to choose for yourself). These pants are on the forgiving side but I overall get the feel this is a style conceit for beautiful ladies of all sizes, but lends greatly to our sisters out there on the taller/slender side; I am no fashion expert but I am an average almost considered “short” gal so I am not particularly too keen on fashions that may make me look wider/squatty because trust me… I’ve been a victim in the fashion world to that lol. Ladies, you do what you makes you most comfortable & makes you feel cute - I have no doubts this is something anyone can wear with ease & SUPER CUTENESS!
This set is SO soft, almost silky, and comfortable !

I don’t know how to describe the material it is sooo soft and thick! I love it! I am between sizes so I sized up. The pants run larger than the top! Effortlessly flattering can’t wear to wear it all fall and winter. Also I am 5’10” and pants hit ground for me

The EVALESS Two Piece Set is Sporty and Stylish. The thick woven material reminds me of the athletic warm up suits/ track suits from high school sports. It has hangs nicely and has structure that will flatter most figures. The flared legs and v-neck are the trendy flourishes needed to elevate this beyond the basic sweatpants and shirt. The drawstring is functional and the waist is very forgiving. This set is great for hanging out with friends or family and running errands.  This works well with casual glam accessories or minimalist looks.

This is a nice lounge set, great for meetings on video from the waist up. Top lays nicely and is very similar to the pictures in the listing. The pants are comfy, the fabric has very little give, so size accordingly. What's not so comfy is while the images on the pants show the waist at the model's waist - on me they are totaly Urkel pants - as in Steve Urkel. Not something I find very comfy and I'm not short waisted. If I put the waist band at my natural waist, the crotch of the pants hovers just about mid-thigh. The measurements in the listing are accurate for what I received. If the top were sold separately, I'd get it in another color. The pants will become true house lounge pants. Nice set, just not for me. However, this would absolutely not stop me from looking at Evaless products in the future - that's how much I like the top!
Update- I got the blue in large. I like the medium and large size. This is such great quality!  Wow this looks so high end. Fabric is wonderful. So comfortable and slimming!

评论概述: Stylish and Comfortable Fall Lounge Set
评论详情: The EVALESS Two Piece Set for Women is a perfect choice for fall lounging. The V-neck sweatshirt is cozy and has a flattering cut that adds a touch of style to its comfort. Paired with the wide-leg sweatpants, this set is both chic and relaxed, making it ideal for both lounging at home and casual outings.  The X-Large size fits beautifully, providing a relaxed yet tailored look. The gray color is versatile and looks great with various accessories. The material is soft and warm, perfect for cooler weather. This lounge set combines comfort with style, making it a must-have for a comfy and fashionable fall wardrobe. Highly recommend!

I really like this lounge set.  It's a silky looking finish, flows real easily.  The description indicated it runs on the large side.  I did not find this to be the case.  I ordered an XXL (normally wear an XL or XXL).  The waist just fits, the remainder of the pants are large and flowy.  The waist is very high, coming up to within 2 inches of my bra.  The top fits perfect, but is not on the larger side.  I think that it's a nice contrast to the flowy bottoms, otherwise could have looked sloppy.  The coffee color was a bit lighter than I expected, more like a latte and is so pretty.  I have blond hair and light skin and it's very attractive against my coloring.  I'm happy with it.

I’m very impressed by the quality of this two piece set. It’s soft and very comfortable and looks flattering on. Hangs nicely on my body and doesn’t feel too tight or anything. It can be worn out casually or just around the house to lounge in.
The fit is roomy, and comfortable. The material is soft, not like the itchy kind. It goes to my ankles, and it's great for inside the house or outside. Love it.

I really like this set overall.  The color is perfect and the set is pretty true to size.  The fabric is comfortable but the shirt fits a bit smaller than the pants, which is the opposite of how things usually fit me, so if someone is larger on top you may wish to size up.One thing to note on the pants--the legs are VERY WIDE LEG, not at all like the pictures, which is why I took off a star.  I was disappointed by this because that's not great--I wanted them to be much closer to the images. It's almost comical how wide these legs are--it makes the outfit look sloppy, unfortunately, so it's not the elevated look I would normally choose.

I received the brown 2X.  The brown is as portrayed on the website.  I like the color very much.  I am a 2x five foot five woman.  The bottoms absolutely swim on me.  The pants are very very wide and very long.  If I were to wear 5 inch heels the length would work.  The top on the other hand is great except a little tighter than I like through the middle.  I like the cut, though casual it looks less casual with the collar.  The fabric is not cotton and does not breath well.  So do not plan to do any exercise in this outfit.  This type of fabric knit tends to make me overheated.  The three stars are for the poor fit on the bottoms.  The rest is just personal preference.
